entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
